authoritativeContentCount.description: Authoritative content count is the official count. This is the teller content count when tellers are present, but member content count when there are no tellers.

authoritativeNotContentCount.description: Authoritative not content count is the official count. This is the teller not content count when tellers are present, but member not content count when there are no tellers.

divisionHadTellers.description: Whether the division had tellers or not

tellerContentCount.description: Content count is count recorded by the tellers

tellerNotContentCount.description: Not Content count recorded by the tellers

memberContentCount.description: Member content count is the total tally of all members that voted content

memberNotContentCount.description: Member not content count is the total tally of all members that voted not content
